template_reference.name: action
template_reference.comment: The glider is semi-invulnerable for until it stops (upgrade gets removed) - then it can be killed.

template_reference.name: action
template_reference.comment: Adds the upgrade that says "I'm not stopped" - removed later in the stopped_actions on land (flight_ext)

template_reference.name: action
template_reference.comment: Reinforce disabled if not in connected territory, not finished landing, or hard a hard landing

template_reference.name: action
template_reference.comment: Attempt to turn off sight while gliding

template_reference.name: action
template_reference.comment: Set the "variant_type" for HQ or default glider

template_reference.name: action
template_reference.comment: Removing this upgade should allow the glider to be vulnerable again, if it was invulnerable.

list.name: requirement_table
list.comment: If you haven't done a hard landing, allow units to be produced by the glider

list.name: actions
list.comment: Please read: Height above actions are used to implement the concept of hard and soft landing. If the glider has a certain amount of damage on its flight then it will perform a 'hard' landing, we use a requirement action to determine this.

template_reference.name: action
template_reference.comment: Tags the glider as having hard landed - this locks out certain things

template_reference.name: action
template_reference.comment: Only affects the rotation of the glider when something breaks the wing

template_reference.name: action
template_reference.comment: Only affects the rotation of the glider when something breaks the wing
